name: Lock and reload
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37 by Ava Skoog and Marte Kvamme Strømmen. The theme was one room. Keyboard and mouse~

You find yourself in an unfamiliar room. All doors are locked. Who put you there, and why? Can you get out? 

Didn't quite turn into the intended game where you were supposed to be finding out clues about the owner of the room by examining stuff as there simply wasn't enough time, but we did wrap it up in some way at least! 

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=6155
